title: Two injured in Westport shooting
content:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) -
Two people are recovering after another shooting in Westport.
It happened just after 3:30 a.m. Sunday near 40th Street and Pennsylvania Avenue.
Police say two groups of men were arguing in a parking lot, and then both groups opened fire on each other.
Officers say the victims are expected to survive.
Three people are in custody.
